name: Project Rêverie Grid
description:
Synopsis:

Become part of the futuristic cyberpunk world of Data Rogue City, by going into the glamorous bar Rêverie Grid where the music is fantastic and where you can meet the most interesting and influential personas in the city

This game was made during the whole duration of the game jam , "So Bad It's good Jam 2018"

Features:

- A visual novel containing a WHOPPING 8,000 words

- 4 Different characters, with a depth of an ocean

- Fantastic story telling by a writer who has never write a game of this scale before!

- An original plot not ripping-off other game elements of much better series at all.

- Mind numbing plot twist!

Team:

shad - Writer 

Itch io

Caroldot - Artist

Itch.io

Mayu (whiitestar) - Artist

Itch.io
